commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This is the last bag of garbage. Hup! Maybe now we can take a break?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That went a lot faster than I thought it would. It looks even better than before the typhoon came.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: So the typhoon clean-up has made the town even more beautiful.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Thanks to everyone that helped.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: The stage and food carts' tent repairs seem to have gone well, too.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: The paper lanterns are back up. It's starting to look more like a festival every minute.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The food cart owners are getting ready to start serving as well. At this rate the festival should start this afternoon.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: The venue is starting to smell so good, zura. There's gonna be a ton of food out there soon.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: We might not have time to walk around and eat.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh yeah! We have to get ready, too!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Everyone!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Mari!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I've got some miraculous news. In an hour they'll have the opening ceremony, and then the Summer Festival is finally going to start.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Two takoyaki skewers, two Nibble Mikans, and one yakisoba, coming right up. We're making the takoyaki right now, so it'll take a minute. Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I heard you! They'll be done in a minute! Gah... I named them Bloody Moon Sticks, but they're still calling it takoyaki!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Well, with bloody in the name, I think it might be hard for people to imagine what it might be.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I still don't like it.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: And call me Yohane!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm back!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Welcome back Chika and Riko.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: How's the festival going?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We went and saw the mikoshi shrine. Oh, the taiko drum performance, too. It was amazing!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Everywhere you go it's so lively. The whole town feels like it's one giant festival.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really. Just looking around here you can tell there's tons of people. The food is selling like crazy.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Dia and the others helping at the main tent seem awfully busy dealing with lost items and lost children.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Riko and I will handle the store, so you three go enjoy the summer festival!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: The time has finally come for Yohane to bless the festival with her presence. Humans drunk on the festiveness, prepare to fall from grace!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Heyyyy! My festival blood has been running hot! There's an event where you can try out taiko, right? Let's go to that!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, you guys! And they're gone. There are so many people I can't even see them anymore.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You should go, too. I want you to see the festival we all made together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I will. Gotta take a lot of pictures, too!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: See you later!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Thank you all for coming today.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: The event was nearly canceled because of the typhoon, but thanks to everyone's hard work, we're all enjoying it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It's Ruby's announcement! I don't remember those lines in the script though. Is she ad-libbing? That's incredible!)

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Can you tell me your name and your address? Did you come with your father or mother?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Oh, please don't cry!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Sorry to keep you waiting. Your lost item was this pink foldable umbrella, zura? I mean, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Dia, and Hanamaru?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Welcome! Oh, I guess that's weird to say in the main tent, zura.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Hard at work, I see. Are Chika and Riko taking care of the food cart?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. What about Kanan and Mari? I thought they were here. Oh, can I take some pictures?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Sure. Oh, that gets me kind of nervous when you ask, zura. Kanan and Mari are helping with the Bon dance contest prep.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I wouldn't have been able to do all this myself, so I asked Hanamaru to come over and provide some assistance for a while.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see. Wait, so is Ruby alone right now?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: No need to worry, zura. Listen.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: One of the famous things about Numazu is all the wonderful fish you can catch in Suruga Bay.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: In spring: bonito, whitebate, and shrimp. In summer: horse mackerel and abalone. In fall: flying squid and alfonsino. In winter: sea bream and mackerel. Treats in each season!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow, she's speaking so confidently! It's almost unbelievable she was so nervous. She was even ad-libbing about the typhoon!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Oh, Ruby... She used to follow me around crying, and look at her now. She's grown so much!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Dia, your cheeks are soaked with tears!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The Bon dance contest is going to start soon. I really need to get some pictures of it! Where was it again?)

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Okay, one, two, three and four! Yo yoy yoy!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Aqours' Bon dance is starting!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There they are! Mari, Kanan!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Oh, you came! Get over here!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?! Hold on, everyone will see me here! Put me somewhere in the back.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Your shy, little heart will disappear in the heat of the festival, so it's no problem. You'll be missing out by not dancing with everyone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This rhythm is for the Awa dance... Hold on, something's not right here.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Just forget about Mari's strange way of talking and revel in the liveliness of the festival!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: This is Aqours' original Bon dance that your idea helped create. Now, let's dance all together!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: E-Eeek!
